Scrambled eggs with spinach and cheese.recipe: Beat the eggs and cook in a non-stick pan. Add spinach and cheese.

Greek yogurt with sliced banana and almo.recipe: Mix Greek yogurt with sliced banana. Top with almonds.

Grilled chicken salad with avocado and a.recipe: Grill the chicken and slice. Mix with salad, avocado, and almonds.

Salmon and spinach salad with olive oil.recipe: Grill the salmon and serve on a bed of spinach salad. Drizzle with olive oil.

Beef stir-fry with broccoli and cauliflo.recipe: Stir-fry the beef and broccoli. Serve with cauliflower rice.

Chicken and vegetable stir-fry with caul.recipe: Stir-fry the chicken and vegetables. Serve with cauliflower rice.

Grilled chicken with roasted vegetables.recipe: Grill the chicken and serve with roasted vegetables.

Salmon and roasted vegetables.recipe: Bake the salmon and serve with roasted vegetables.
